column3: Order your companion to follow you.
Allow your companion to make his own decisions in battle.

Order your companion to focus on defensive maneuvers, using only actions learned from the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Defender<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> skill tree.

Order your companion to focus more on offensive maneuvers, using only actions learned from the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Attacker<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> skill tree.

Order your companion to stop fighting and concentrate on healing maneuvers, using only actions learned from the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Healer<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> skill tree.
